entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of snow. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
